Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello! How can I assist you today?

If your card payment failed, even though you have enough funds, it might be due to restrictions or issues on the bank's side. I recommend contacting your bank to resolve the payment matter. Alternatively, you can add a different payment method to your account. If you choose to update your account with a different payment method, don't forget to resubmit your ads! You can also consider adding ad credits as a short-term solution.
can i add funds through usdt?

Currently, NewsBreak does not support adding funds through USDT or any other cryptocurrency. You can add funds using a credit card for Autopay or Prepay options. If you have any more questions about payment methods, feel free to ask!

If your card was working perfectly before and you're experiencing issues now, it might be due to temporary authorization holds or changes in your bank's policies. I suggest reaching out to your bank for more details. You can also try adding a different payment method or using ad credits as an alternative.

Ad credits are used before your primary payment method, like a credit card. They typically do not expire unless specified otherwise. To redeem ad credits, go to the Billing Section, click on ‘Add ad credits,’ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit plus at least $1. If your campaign costs exceed your ad credit balance, the remaining amount will be charged to your linked payment method.
i have to talk with agent

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If it's something I can't resolve, I can guide you on how to contact our support team.
i have to chat with support team

I've sent a request to our support team on your behalf. You can also reach out directly by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with your query. They'll be able to assist you further. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
